long_description: Scarves aren't just for winter anymore. The Pistil Deena Scarf features bright colors and a soft, delicate texture to add a stylish touch to shorts and a sweater or your favorite sundress. Soft, lightweight modal fabric is naturally breathable. Pistil Deena Scarf features raw, unfinished edges.
short_description: Scarves aren't just for winter anymore. The Pistil Deena Scarf features bright colors and a soft, delicate texture to add a stylish touch to shorts and a sweater or your favorite sundress.
